--mbx-form-submit-background-light.description: Form submit button background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off'

--mbx-form-submit-background-dark.description: Form submit button background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on'

--mbx-form-submit-text-color-light.description: Form submit button text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off'

--mbx-form-submit-text-color-dark.description: Form submit button text color when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on'

--mbx-form-formfield-background.description: Extended from [FormField](../../molecules/FormField/index.md) - Fallback value for `--mbx-form-formfield-background-light` and `--mbx-form-formfield-background-dark`

--mbx-form-formfield-background-dark.description: Extended from [FormField](../../molecules/FormField/index.md) - FormField background when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off`
